scripts.build: export $(cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat compile
scripts.size:contract: export $(cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat size-contracts --no-compile
scripts.test: export $(cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && HARDHAT_DEPLOY_FIXTURE=true HARDHAT_COMPILE=true hardhat test
scripts.coverage: export $(cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && HARDHAT_DEPLOY_FIXTURE=true hardhat coverage
scripts.remove:console: export $(cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat remove-logs
scripts.check:storage: export $(cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat check
scripts.fork:test: export $(cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && HARDHAT_DEPLOY_FIXTURE=true HARDHAT_FORK=true npx hardhat test
scripts.fork:execute: export $(cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && HARDHAT_FORK=true npx hardhat run
scripts.fork:testnet: export $(cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && HARDHAT_FORK=true npx hardhat node
scripts.node:hardhat: export $(cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat node --no-deploy
scripts.node:hardhat:deploy: export $(cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat node --network hardhat --export ./deployments/localhost.json
scripts.deploy:hardhat: export $(cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat deploy --network localhost --export ./deployments/localhost.json
scripts.run:hardhat: export $(cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat run --network localhost
scripts.deploy:testnet: export $(cat env/.testnet.env | xargs) && npx hardhat deploy --network testnet --export ./deployments/testnet.json
scripts.run:testnet: export $(cat env/.testnet.env | xargs) && npx hardhat run --network testnet
